Get paginated list of categories with advanced filtering and sorting options.

### Query Parameters
- **page** (int, optional): Page number for pagination. Default: 1
- **per_page** (int, optional): Number of items per page. Default: 15, Max: 100
- **include** (string, optional): Comma-separated related resources to include. Options: children, parent, attributes, products
- **only_active** (boolean, optional): Show only active categories. Default: true
- **parent_id** (int, optional): Filter by parent category ID. Use null for root categories
- **sort_by** (string, optional): Field to sort by. Options: name, created_at, updated_at, order. Default: name
- **sort_order** (string, optional): Sort order. Options: asc, desc. Default: asc
- **search** (string, optional): Search term to filter categories by name or description

### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Men's Fashion",
      "slug": "mens-fashion",
      "is_active": true,
      "parent_id": null,
      "children_count": 5,
      "products_count": 42,
      "created_at": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z",
      "updated_at": "2023-01-15T10:30:00Z"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "current_page": 1,
    "from": 1,
    "last_page": 3,
    "per_page": 15,
    "to": 15,
    "total": 42
  }
}"
```

request.description:
Create a new product category with detailed configuration.

### Request Body
```json
{
  "name": "Men's Fashion",
  "slug": "mens-fashion",
  "description": "Clothing and accessories for men",
  "parent_id": null,
  "is_active": true,
  "is_featured": true,
  "display_mode": "products_and_description",
  "meta_title": "Men's Fashion | Your Store",
  "meta_description": "Shop the latest men's fashion collection",
  "meta_keywords": ["men's clothing", "men's fashion", "menswear"],
  "banner": "categories/banners/mens-fashion.jpg",
  "logo": "categories/logos/mens-fashion.png",
  "order": 1,
  "attributes": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "is_required": true,
      "is_variant": true,
      "default_value": "Red",
      "sort_order": 1
    }
  ]
}
```

### Required Fields
- **name** (string): Category name
- **slug** (string): URL-friendly slug (auto-generated if not provided)

### Optional Fields
- **description** (string): Category description
- **parent_id** (int|null): ID of parent category (null for root categories)
- **is_active** (boolean): Whether the category is active (default: true)
- **is_featured** (boolean): Whether the category is featured (default: false)
- **display_mode** (string): How products are displayed (products_only, products_with_description, etc.)
- **meta_title** (string): SEO meta title
- **meta_description** (string): SEO meta description
- **meta_keywords** (array): Array of SEO keywords
- **banner** (string): Path/URL to category banner image
- **logo** (string): Path/URL to category logo
- **order** (int): Display order (default: 0)
- **attributes** (array): Array of attribute configurations for this category

### Attribute Configuration
- **id** (int): Attribute ID (required)
- **is_required** (boolean): Whether the attribute is required
- **is_variant** (boolean): Whether the attribute is used for variants
- **default_value** (string): Default value for the attribute
- **sort_order** (int): Display order of the attribute

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Men's Apparel",
    "is_active": true,
    "is_featured": true,
    "display_mode": "products_only",
    "meta_title": "Men's Apparel | Updated Collection",
    "meta_description": "Updated collection of men's apparel",
    "meta_keywords": ["men's clothing", "men's apparel", "fashion"],
    "banner": "categories/banners/updated-mens-apparel.jpg",

        {
            "id": 1,
            "is_required": false,
            "is_variant": true,

            "sort_order": 1
        }
    ]
}

request.description:
Update an existing category. Only include fields that need to be updated.

### URL Parameters
- **:id** (required): The ID of the category to update

### Request Body
```json
{
  "name": "Men's Apparel",
  "is_active": true,
  "is_featured": true,
  "display_mode": "products_only",
  "meta_title": "Men's Apparel | Updated Collection",
  "meta_description": "Updated collection of men's apparel",
  "meta_keywords": ["men's clothing", "men's apparel", "fashion"],
  "banner": "categories/banners/updated-mens-apparel.jpg",
  "order": 2,
  "attributes": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "is_required": false,
      "is_variant": true,
      "default_value": "Blue",
      "sort_order": 1
    }
  ]
}
```

### Notes
- The `_method` field is only needed if your API doesn't support PUT directly
- You can update category attributes by including the `attributes` array with the same structure as in the create request
- To remove an attribute, omit it from the `attributes` array or set it to `null`

Delete a category.

### URL Parameters
- **:id** (required): The ID of the category to delete

### Query Parameters
- **force** (boolean, optional): If true, will delete the category even if it has products or subcategories (default: false)
- **move_products_to** (int, optional): If specified, products will be moved to this category before deletion
- **move_subcategories_to** (int, optional): If specified, subcategories will be moved to this parent category before deletion

### Notes
- If `force` is false and the category has products or subcategories, the deletion will fail
- If `move_products_to` or `move_subcategories_to` are provided, those resources will be reassigned before deletion
- Returns HTTP 204 No Content on success

Get all attributes assigned to a specific category with filtering options.

### URL Parameters
- **:id** (required): The ID of the category

### Query Parameters
- **include** (string, optional): Comma-separated related resources to include. Options: values, products
- **is_required** (boolean, optional): Filter by required status
- **is_variant** (boolean, optional): Filter by variant status

### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Color",
      "type": "select",
      "is_required": true,
      "is_variant": true,
      "default_value": "Red",
      "sort_order": 1,
      "values": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "value": "Red",
          "products_count": 10
        },
        {
          "id": 2,
          "value": "Blue",
          "products_count": 8
        }
      ],
      "products_count": 18
    }
  ]
}"
```

Assign an attribute to a category with custom configuration.

### URL Parameters
- **:id** (required): The ID of the category

### Request Body
```json
{
  "attribute_id": 1,
  "is_required": true,
  "is_variant": true,
  "default_value": "Red",
  "sort_order": 1,
  "use_default_config": false,
  "validation_rules": {
    "min": 1,
    "max": 10,
    "regex": "^[a-zA-Z0-9\s-]+$"
  }
}
```

### Required Fields
- **attribute_id** (int): The ID of the attribute to assign

### Optional Fields
- **is_required** (boolean): Whether this attribute is required for products in this category (default: false)
- **is_variant** (boolean): Whether this attribute should be used for product variants (default: false)
- **default_value** (string): Default value for this attribute in this category
- **sort_order** (int): Display order of the attribute in this category (default: 0)
- **use_default_config** (boolean): If true, will use the attribute's default configuration (default: true)
- **validation_rules** (object): Custom validation rules for this attribute in this category

Update the configuration of an attribute for a specific category.

### URL Parameters
- **:category_id** (required): The ID of the category
- **:attribute_id** (required): The ID of the attribute to update

### Request Body
```json
{
  "is_required": false,
  "is_variant": true,
  "default_value": "Blue",
  "sort_order": 2,
  "use_default_config": false,
  "validation_rules": {
    "min": 1,
    "max": 10
  }
}
```

### Notes
- Only include fields that need to be updated
- To reset to default configuration, set `use_default_config: true`
- The attribute must already be assigned to the category

Remove an attribute from a category.

### URL Parameters
- **:category_id** (required): The ID of the category
- **:attribute_id** (required): The ID of the attribute to remove

### Query Parameters
- **force** (boolean, optional): If true, will remove the attribute even if it's in use by products (default: false)

### Notes
- If `force` is false and the attribute is in use by products, the operation will fail
- Returns HTTP 204 No Content on success

Bulk update attributes for a category. This will replace all existing attribute assignments.

### URL Parameters
- **:id** (required): The ID of the category

### Request Body
```json
{
  "attributes": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "is_required": true,
      "is_variant": true,
      "default_value": "Red",
      "sort_order": 1,
      "validation_rules": {
        "min": 1,
        "max": 10
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "is_required": false,
      "is_variant": false,
      "sort_order": 2,
      "use_default_config": true
    }
  ],
  "delete_missing": true
}
```

### Fields
- **attributes** (array): Array of attribute configurations
  - **id** (int): Attribute ID (required)
  - **is_required** (boolean): Whether the attribute is required
  - **is_variant** (boolean): Whether the attribute is used for variants
  - **default_value** (string): Default value for the attribute
  - **sort_order** (int): Display order of the attribute
  - **use_default_config** (boolean): Whether to use the attribute's default configuration
  - **validation_rules** (object): Custom validation rules
- **delete_missing** (boolean): If true, any attributes not included in this request will be removed from the category (default: false)

### Notes
- This is an atomic operation - either all updates succeed or none do
- Returns HTTP 200 with the updated list of category attributes on success

### Get All Settings
Retrieve all application settings with optional filtering.

#### Query Parameters
- **group** (string, optional): Filter settings by group (e.g., 'general', 'payment', 'shipping')
- **search** (string, optional): Search settings by key or value
- **per_page** (int, optional): Number of items per page (default: 15, max: 100)
- **page** (int, optional): Page number for pagination

#### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "key": "store_name",
      "value": "My Awesome Store",
      "group": "general",
      "type": "text",
      "label": "Store Name",
      "description": "The name of your online store",
      "is_public": true,
      "created_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
      "updated_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "key": "store_email",
      "value": "contact@example.com",
      "group": "general",
      "type": "email",
      "label": "Store Email",
      "description": "Contact email for the store",
      "is_public": true,
      "validation": "required|email"
    }
  ],
  "meta": {
    "current_page": 1,
    "per_page": 15,
    "total": 2
  }
}
```

### Get Setting by Key
Retrieve a specific setting by its key.

#### URL Parameters
- **:key** (required): The key of the setting to retrieve

#### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "key": "store_name",
    "value": "My Awesome Store",
    "group": "general",
    "type": "text",
    "label": "Store Name",
    "description": "The name of your online store",
    "is_public": true,
    "created_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "updated_at": "2023-01-01T00:00:00Z"
  }
}
```

### Update Multiple Settings
Update multiple settings in a single request. Only the provided fields will be updated.

#### Request Body
```json
{
  "settings": [
    {
      "key": "store_name",
      "value": "My Updated Store"
    },
    {
      "key": "store_email",
      "value": "updated@example.com"
    },
    {
      "key": "currency",
      "value": "EUR"
    }
  ]
}
```

#### Fields
- **settings** (array): Array of setting objects to update
  - **key** (string): The setting key (required)
  - **value** (mixed): The new value for the setting
  - **group** (string, optional): The setting group
  - **type** (string, optional): The setting type (text, number, boolean, etc.)
  - **is_public** (boolean, optional): Whether the setting is publicly accessible

#### Notes
- Returns the updated settings in the response
- Only settings that exist will be updated
- Validation rules will be applied based on the setting type

### Update Single Setting
Update a specific setting by its key.

#### URL Parameters
- **:key** (required): The key of the setting to update

#### Request Body
```json
{
  "value": "My Updated Store",
  "group": "general",
  "type": "text",
  "is_public": true
}
```

#### Fields
- **value** (mixed): The new value for the setting (required)
- **group** (string, optional): The setting group
- **type** (string, optional): The setting type (text, number, boolean, etc.)
- **is_public** (boolean, optional): Whether the setting is publicly accessible

#### Notes
- Returns the updated setting in the response
- If the setting doesn't exist, it will be created
- Validation rules will be applied based on the setting type

### Get Settings by Group
Retrieve all settings within a specific group.

#### URL Parameters
- **:group** (required): The group name to filter settings by

#### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": [

      "group": "payment",
      "type": "password",
      "label": "Stripe Secret Key"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Get Public Settings
Retrieve settings that are marked as public. No authentication required.

#### Query Parameters
- **keys** (string, optional): Comma-separated list of setting keys to retrieve

#### Example Response
```json
{
  "data": {
    "store_name": "My Awesome Store",
    "store_email": "contact@example.com",
    "currency": "USD"
  }
}
```

### Get Group with Settings
Retrieve a specific setting group with all its settings.

#### URL Parameters
- **:group** (required): The group name

#### Query Parameters
- **include** (string, optional): Comma-separated related resources to include (e.g., 'settings')

#### Example Response

```json
        "id": 11,
        "key": "payment_stripe_secret_key",
        "value": "sk_test_...",
        "type": "password",
        "label": "Stripe Secret Key"
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
